# Greatberry (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Targets:** 2d4 fresh berries touched

**Duration:** 1 day/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Grimoire Mutamateria (Dreadfox Games), pg. 18

This spell functions like *[[Goodberry (Spell)|goodberry]]* except each berry cures 3 points of damage to a maximum of 24 points of such curing in a 24-hour period and makes a creature immune to fatigue, exhaustion and sickness for 1 hour.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Shaman 3 to Level.
